step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the top layer and choose the Scribble Selection tool.=Tap the top layer and choose the Scribble Selection tool.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Keep and paint around the edges inside the woman’s shape.=Tap Keep and paint around the edges inside the woman’s shape.

$$$/Tutorial/Tap Remove and paint around the edge outside the woman’s shape to isolate her from the background.=Tap Remove and paint around the edge outside the woman’s shape to isolate her from the background.

$$$/Tutorial/Choose Select > Refine Edge. Reduce the size of the brush and paint along the edge of the woman’s shape.=Choose Select > Refine Edge. Reduce the size of the brush and paint along the edge of the woman’s shape.
$$$/Tutorial/Once the background has been masked, tap OK.=Once the background has been masked, tap OK.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Add Layer > Layer from Selection. Tap the target icon on the middle layer to hide it.=Tap Add Layer > Layer from Selection. Tap the target icon on the middle layer to hide it.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Effects > Photo > Sleepy Hollow. Set the intensity to about 50% and tap Apply.=Tap Effects > Photo > Sleepy Hollow. Set the intensity to about 50% and tap Apply.

$$$/Tutorial/Select the bottom layer. Tap Effects > Basic > Directional Blur. Enter a blur of 50 and tap Apply.=Select the bottom layer. Tap Effects > Basic > Directional Blur. Enter a blur of 50 and tap Apply.
